p: The soil seed bank of the study area contained comparable numbers of plant species to that were reported in the seed bank of Wadi Fatima, Western Saudi Arabia, where 56 plant species were recorded ( El Karemy and Zayed, 1999). Moreover, the soil seed bank in the central region of Saudi Arabia has been reported to have a comparable number of plant species, where 56 plant species were recorded in the seed bank of Rawdhat Khorim ( Al-Yemeni et al., 2000), and 44 species Raudhat al-Khafs, Riyadh region, Saudi Arabia ( Assaeed and Al-Doss, 2002).
